td.content: s:a f instructor aged 46 yrs says she is having symptoms of mild abdominal pain 8 x week, in spite of treatment. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 80.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, and ordered CT Abdomen.
